name: request-header
description: Request Header microservice exercise for FreeCodeCamp

scripts.build:static: for f in static/*; do cp $f deploy/${f#static/deploy-}; done
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:static
scripts.deploy:commit: cd deploy; if [[ `git status --porcelain` ]]; then git add `find . -maxdepth 1 -type f` && git commit -m 'pushing updates from parent'; fi
scripts.deploy:push: cd deploy && git push heroku master
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:commit && npm run deploy:push

author: JW
